column5: I have it on good authority that there will be a swill at Arizona after the show closes.  This is where we met last year, a handy place to the Show location, and close to the highways.  The place is very large with lots o room for us until the locals arrive around 10.  Arizona is also known for its very talented staff.  There is no need for reservations at 6 on Saturday eve, but it would be a good idea to let others know if you want to stop by.  Last year there were about 25, including dignitaries up the wazoo.  I doubt that they will grace us with their presence this year, but I think that will be an improvement, pompous !@#$%%$.  Good wings and nachos, mebbe a draft by accident, wonderful service.  Even Greencoachdog has been there.  See you around 6 pm in on the 17th.
Directions Douglas ..

Arizona's Website,  and a map.  .  This is the rest of the info:  Arizona B-Bar & Grill  215 Carlingview Drive Etobicoke  Tel: (416) 674-7772]  They are located about 2 km from the International Centre, south and east along Airport Road, and then right at Carlingview Drive.  100 m on the lhs.
COUNT me in .   Sure hope they take plasteeeek .  See you there boys and girls.

Yeah, I won't make it this year Doug. Remember to take your OFC hats off at 10PM. Last year they asked this 60 year old to remove his hat....hats are apparently a gang thing. The criminal organization that I belong to chose beige as their colours....go figure.
Oh Yes! I remember, great company and food!!!... and... Ahhhh yes!... the staff (far away look in eyes).
bump
shouldn't we be fish'n on a saturday?
I thought that's what Monday to Friday were for.....

I think I will be @ the show on the 17th.... but unfortunately will miss the festivities afterwards... as  I will be at the leaf Game.... Have fun boys.... do they allow flash photography? please say they do!! if so I expect a FULL report.  Gerritt.
I hope to attend. I'll try to keep Jethro out of it. Last time he went to one of them thar affairs, he cleaned out all the vitels afore anyone showed up.  Tarnation!!
If I can get that Saturday off work (I'm really hoping to), I may show up...just giving you fair warning   I won't know until Monday or Tuesday next week though.  Maureen
Bump again.  *sigh*
Crap ... for once its right in my back yard ... but Im gonna be up on lake Joe chasing lakers ... cant we do it thursday ?
bump
Well DouG.. since thats the Saturday before my B-day... I just may have to make it...
bump
Bump... Good beer on tap.. I am going to try and make it depending on my herd keeping up.
Like Jeff Gordon would say "I hate all that bumping"  Quit it DouG
Wayne, you would have to rup that in, huh? Now where's that voodoo doll?
I plan to be there with my nephew.  Maureen
Doug,  Are you buying?  Could grease the wheels.
